Interface Database<Z>

  • Type Parameters:
    Z - connection source (e.g. Driver, DataSource, etc.)

extends Comparable<Database<Z>>

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()
        Returns the unique idenfier for this database
        Returns:
        a unique identifier

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the location of this database
        Returns:
        a location

      • getWeight

        int getWeight()
        Returns the relative "weight" of this cluster node. In general, when choosing a node to service read requests, a cluster will favor the node with the highest weight. A weight of 0 is somewhat special, depending on the type of balancer used by the cluster. In most cases, a weight of 0 means that this node will never service read requests unless it is the only node in the cluster.
        Returns:
        a positive integer

      • isLocal

        boolean isLocal()
        Indicates whether or not this database is local to the machine on which the JVM resides.
        Returns:
        true if local, false if remote

      • decodePassword

                      throws SQLException

        Connection connect(Z connectionSource,
                 String password)
                   throws SQLException
        Connects to the database using the specified connection factory.
        Parameters:
        connectionSource - a factory object for creating connections
        Returns:
        a database connection
        Throws:
        SQLException - if connection fails

      • createConnectionSource

        Z createConnectionSource()
        Factory method for creating a connection factory object for this database.
        Returns:
        a connection factory object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if connection factory could not be created
